subject: Coaches and Managers
Medicine and Health
Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets’ special teams coordinator, Mike Westhoff, spent all season on crutches, on doctor’s orders, after surgery on his left leg in February. Coaching is what carried him through this season, what gave him strength.
snippet: The Jets’ special teams coordinator, Mike Westhoff, spent all season on crutches, on doctor’s orders, after surgery on his left leg in February. Coaching is what carried him through this season, what gave him strength.
